Articles.Content:
This is my compact launching base on Mun using Mod

Extraplanetary Lauchpad and Kethane

Development of the mission:

> Launching a satellite reconnaissance to locate sites containing Kethane and ore on Mun

> Launching a rover to find a flat area, including areas suitable for drilling Kethane and Ore

> Construction of all modules separately and simulation on Kerbin to verify that the Docking Port are well aligned and everything is functional

> Launching drilling Kethane module

> Launching converter module and communication

> Launching "Power Station" Module

> Launching storage resources module

> Launching launchpad module

> Assembling modules

> Collecting resources

> Making a test rocket

> Launching test rocket > Yes works fine

> launching heavy objects at lower cost fuel > works really really good!
I dont get it. is it some sort of mod?

Yeah, it's the Kethane mod, where you can mine for Kethane, then i'm assuming that with it's black magic, the converter converts it into a usable substance in which that launchpad can use to create spacecraft which can be launched from the Mun.

Yeah, it's the Kethane mod, where you can mine for Kethane, then i'm assuming that with it's black magic, the converter converts it into a usable substance in which that launchpad can use to create spacecraft which can be launched from the Mun.

If you've seen the Extraplanetary Launchpad's thread, Metal is used to make the rocket parts, and the metal itself is a modified version of Kethane.

On topic: Looks pretty neat, especially the design. Looks like a lil' subway train!
